code: var getEditedThumbnail=function getEditedThumbnail(imageLink){var splittedUrl=imageLink.split('image/upload/');var firstPart=splittedUrl[0];var secondPart=splittedUrl[1];var transformApi='w_70,h_90,c_fill,g_auto/';return[firstPart,transformApi,secondPart].join('');};export var getCircularAvatar=function getCircularAvatar(imageLink){var splittedUrl=imageLink.split('image/upload/');var firstPart=splittedUrl[0];var secondPart=splittedUrl[1];var transformApi='w_200,h_200,c_fill,g_auto/';return[firstPart,transformApi,secondPart].join('');};export default getEditedThumbnail;
